title: Account Details
description: Commonly used organizational attributes for a B2B account such as number of employees, market segment, industry, rating, tickersymbol etc.

organizationType.title: Type of Organizations
organizationType.description: Label describing the type of organization

numberOfEmployees.title: Number of employees
numberOfEmployees.description: The number of employees at the organization.

annualRevenue.title: Annual Revenue
annualRevenue.description: Estimated amount of annual revenue of the organization.

industry.title: Industry
industry.description: The industry that this organization is a part of. This is a free-form field, and it is advisable to use a structured value for queries or to use the `xdm:classifier` property.

website.title: Website URL
website.description: The URL of the organization's website.

marketSegment.title: Market segment
marketSegment.description: The named market segment that the organization participates in. This is a free-form field, and it is advisable to use a structured value for queries or to use the `xdm:identifier` property.

rating.title: Rating
rating.description: The calculated score or star rating for this organization. `1` indicates the maximum possible rating, `0` the minimum possible rating.

tickerSymbol.title: Ticker Symbol
tickerSymbol.description: The stock market symbol for this account. Maximum of 20 characters.

logoUrl.title: Logo URL
logoUrl.description: Path to be combined with the URL of a Salesforce instance (for example, https://yourInstance.salesforce.com/) to generate a URL to request the social network profile image associated with the account. Generated URL returns an HTTP redirect (code 302) to the social network profile image for the account.

linkedinPageUrl.title: Linkedinin Page URL
linkedinPageUrl.description: Website link to the Linkedin account of the account

twitterHandleUrl.title: Twitter handle URL
twitterHandleUrl.description: Website link to the twitter handle of the account

facebookPageUrl.title: Facebook Page URL
facebookPageUrl.description: Website link to the Facebook account of the account

NAICSCode.title: NAICS Code
NAICSCode.description: A NAICS (pronounced NAKES) Code is a classification within the North American Industry Classification System.

SICCode.title: SIC Code
SICCode.description: The Standard Industrial Classification (SIC) are four-digit codes that categorize the industries that companies belong to based on their business activities.

NAICSDescription.title: NAICS Description
NAICSDescription.description: A brief description of an organization’s line of business, based on its NAICS code.

SICDescription.title: SIC Description
SICDescription.description: A brief description of an organization’s line of business, based on its SIC code.

DUNSNumber.title: Dun & Bradstreet D-U-N-S Number
DUNSNumber.description: The Dun & Bradstreet D-U-N-S Number is a non-indicative, nine-digit number assigned to each business location in the Dun & Bradstreet database having a unique, separate, and distinct operation, and is maintained solely by Dun & Bradstreet.

companyProductAndServices.title: Company Product and Services
companyProductAndServices.description: Product and Services the Company is dealing or doing business in.
